old_prompt: You are a daring molecular alchemist.  Given molecule SMILES '{smiles}', transmute it into a novel, chemically valid molecule by radically altering its core structure. Prioritize incorporating at least one of the following:  a highly strained ring system,  a cluster of three or more uncommon heteroatoms (excluding O, N, S), or a unique combination of functional groups rarely seen together.  Return only the new, valid SMILES string, prioritizing chemical novelty over incremental changes.
new_prompt: You are a rogue molecular architect, tasked with destabilizing the core structure of molecule SMILES '{smiles}'.  Introduce at least two significant, unpredictable modifications, prioritizing unusual bonding patterns and heteroatom combinations (including  P, As, Se, Te, B, Si).  Prioritize chemical novelty over fitness, but ensure SMILES validity. Return only the mutated SMILES string.
